Package uni.hamburg.yamms.fieldTerms

Interface Summary
FieldTerm A field term (effective field) for the solution of the LLG equation
 

Class Summary
BetterDemagField Sophisticated implementation of the demagnetization field.
CompositeFieldTerm Field term for combining multiple 'real' field terms by addition
CuteDemagField A simple implementation of the demagnetization field, using the fast fourier transform.
DemagField Sophisticated implementation of the demagnetization field.
DemagTensorField Represents the demagnetization tensor field and offers static members for the calculation of the tensor field from a topology using the method introduced by Newell et al.
ExchangeField Implementation of the exchange field term using a nearest neighbor method for the second derivative.
StaticZeemanField Implementation of a static, uniform zeeman field
UniaxialAnisotropyField Uniaxial Anisotropy field term of 4th order arbitrary anisotropy direction
